span.span: After a phone conference with the Oklahoma State Department of Education today, we have had to implement some changes to the meal pick ups. Beginning this Monday, March 23rd, breakfast and lunch will be available for pickup from 9:00-10:00 a.m. each week day. There will be no later pick up available. When you arrive, please pull through the elementary pick up line, tell the staff member how many meals you need, and the food will be brought out to you. Please do not exit your vehicles! If you wish to pick up meals for other families' children, just add that number into the ones you are picking up for your own children. In an effort to make sure we have enough meals available, please message the school Facebook page, or send an email to

with the number of meals you would like to pick up, if possible. As a reminder, there will be no one in the building, so please do not call the school. You can reach us at the email previously listed, or via the Facebook page messenger. Thank you for your understanding.

p.span: History tells us that a warrior is one who is engaged aggressively or energetically in an activity, cause or conflict. Native American warriors were known for their aggression which was fueled by their honor, pride, and sense of self-preservation.

The Ripley Warriors are also energetically engaged in activities, causes, and conflicts on our ballfields and basketball courts as well as in our student organizations and classrooms. We aggressively engage our education and co-curricular activities with honor, integrity, and bravery like those proud Native American warriors from long ago. We embrace their spirit and honor their memory.

div.br:
403 E. Cook
PO Box 97
Ripley, Oklahoma 74062

br.p: First bell rings at 8:20. Classes begin at 8:25 am and end at 3:10 pm
Office hours: Monday – Friday, 8:00 am – 4:00 pm
